website_summaries.verdict: A brake rotor that comes with a rounded radius that adds strength.
pros: Manufactured with multiple alloys that improve heat dissipation and performance
Mill-balanced for proper rotor function as no extra weights are needed
Quality validated for proper metallurgy and correct brake plate thickness
cons: May not be compatible with every vehicle advertised

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, basic disc
customer_reviews.text: The reasons for 4 stars are: no threaded holes for removal and no coating (but I knew that). If you are just needing a quality disc and don't care about those 2 items this is a solid choice. Grease the mating surfaces if you ever want to get these off. That includes the edge at the center hub and the face of the axel. Otherwise these will rust to the axel and never come off.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C.

customer_reviews.title: Affordable.
customer_reviews.text: Fitment for a 2000 Sienna. Replaced it after the last one started to squeak, 18 months ago. Affordable enough to skip the sanding down and just order a new rotor. Just spray brake cleaner where the pads contact and wipe it off with a clean rag on both sides.
customer_reviews.author: hawaiiannovice

customer_reviews.title: Spend more, get slotted
customer_reviews.text: Not that great. It’s cheap but might as well spend a little more for slotted rotors. I bought these bc I was gonna keep my mini van for long but still, shoulda upgraded n got better rotors...literally like 10 more bucks
customer_reviews.author: Blue car guy

customer_reviews.title: Nice rotors.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and fast shipping. I installed these with wagner brake pads and very quite and smooth braking on my moms 1998 toyota camry after she rode her old pads for too long and grinded up the old rotors. Few hours work and got car on the road again.
customer_reviews.author: ckanchola

customer_reviews.title: What i got and what was shown are two different things.
customer_reviews.text: The rotors fit perfectly. My only issue is that they differed from the ones shown on the page. The ones I got are lacking the two (2) 10mm threaded holes to facilitate future removal if necessary. The ones shown on the Amazon page clearly have these holes.
customer_reviews.author: Kimu

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality product at a low cost
customer_reviews.text: Replaced the driver's side rotor and the slight shimmy while stepping the brakes down a hill is not there anymore. This is an excellent high-quality product at a low cost.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Nari

customer_reviews.title: I like these rotors on my 2003 Sienna
customer_reviews.text: I put these on the front of my '03 Sienna, along with Bosch Quietcast ceramic pads. I'm very pleased. These rotors seem very heavy duty. The brakes are now quiet and effective.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kehoe

customer_reviews.title: Price - quality
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice product for that price. Good quality, I recommend. Easy to install...
customer_reviews.author: Amazonman

customer_reviews.title: Ok rotors
customer_reviews.text: Ok rotors a little noisy with wagner thermoquiets dont know if its rotors,pads or combination of both,not enough to be annoying though, some rust which is to be expected on non coated rotors,would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Roger Anglin

customer_reviews.title: fixed my break vibration issue
customer_reviews.text: Works well enough (less than 100 Miles on them so far. - fixed my brake vibration issue) There is no threaded holes on the rotor hat like the image shows. The two extra holes are threaded and meant to make later removal of the rotor easier. No big deal for me, but I thought I'd mention it and subtract a star since the product is a little different than what's imaged here.
customer_reviews.author: instaclay

customer_reviews.title: Ac Delco rotors
customer_reviews.text: Quality rotors! Just installed two on the front of my 2001 Toyota Avalon, very quiet no more brake noise
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Right price great fit. The rotors came in plastic bags and ...
customer_reviews.text: Right price great fit. The rotors came in plastic bags and were lightly oiled to prevent rust. Use brake cleaner to spray them off before you break in the rotors
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Bell

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! Fit our 2002 Toyota Solara perfectly! Hopefully they last awhile.
customer_reviews.author: User 1e

customer_reviews.title: what a difference!!!  No more chatter!!  Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love it cause before they would heat up and now no more chatter. Just like new!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!what else can i say???
customer_reviews.author: RosieAnn

customer_reviews.title: These do not fit a 2000 Toyota Camry CE 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: These do not fit a 2000 Toyota Camry CE 4 cylinder 5-speed. Just a heads up to anyone using the amazon parts checker.
customer_reviews.author: SamC

customer_reviews.title: It's very good value for money too
customer_reviews.text: This part has cured a whole lot of defects I hadn't a clue it would cure. Ranging from a screeching noise when I brake harshly, to steering vibration, as well as low wear of brake pads. The list is inexhaustible. It's very good value for money too...
customer_reviews.author: Joe Essex

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. Have put about 2000 miles on the brakes since installation and everything works.
customer_reviews.author: Garry_James

customer_reviews.title: Does the job...
customer_reviews.text: Just fine. Easy fit, runs true, quiet, stops the car without noise or chatter.
customer_reviews.author: DutchTouch1

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They fit nice and work as needed. Easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, i am happy with my purchase, fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: carmen kay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Work great on 2000 Toyota Avalon. Have these rotors for about a month. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Binh Tran

customer_reviews.title: I replaced the Brembo brakes that I bought last year ...
customer_reviews.text: I replaced the Brembo brakes that I bought last year. The Brembo brakes came without any markings, I noticed that the ACDelco has more cooling fins than the Brembo. However, they don't have the 2 tapped holes used to remove the disks.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably smooth
customer_reviews.text: Replace both front rotors, along with the AC Delco Ceramic pads. Brakes are solid, no noises, and braking is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Sol

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I like ACDelco parts but this rotor does not fit a 2000 Toyota Sienna.
customer_reviews.author: SMF

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: The rotors work well, took care of the problem and at a fraction of the cost of a parts store!!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce A. Woodson

customer_reviews.title: great price
customer_reviews.text: Can not believe i received a real GM AC/DELCO rotor for 1/2 the cost!!
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Imperfection on rotor.
customer_reviews.text: Rotor has an imperfection on the inside. Haven't installed yet.
customer_reviews.author: Dntdrgmedwn

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine
customer_reviews.text: Rotors seem to be working fine. Easy install. A lot better than the set I ordered last year that turned out to be the wrong size even though Amazon showed it to fit my car. Never save something a year before installing. You might find a surprise waiting. Money wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Silvia Velazquez

product_meta.title: ACDelco 18A917A Advantage Non-Coated Front Disc Brake Rotor
product_meta.description: ACDelco Advantage Disc Brake Rotors provide reliable vehicle braking power. Application-specific vane configuration offers greater safety and performance, dampens noise and vibration, and maximizes airflow to keep your rotor running cool. They also feature a non-directional ground finish that minimizes thickness variation and helps to extend brake pad life. These dependable aftermarket Disc Brake Rotors offer quality at an economical price. Rotor type - vented.
feature_bullets: Manufactured with multiple alloys for improved heat dissipation and performance
Mill-balanced for proper rotor function; no extra weights are needed
Quality validated for proper metallurgy and correct brake plate thickness

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars82 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
